ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: quetiapine tablets atypical antipsychotic indicated treatment : schizophrenia ( 1.1 ) bipolar disorder manic episodes ( 1.2 ) bipolar disorder , depressive episodes ( 1.2 )
contraindications: quetiapine tablets taken without food ( 2.1 ) indication initial dose recommended dose maximum dose schizophrenia - adults ( 2.2 ) 25 mg twice daily 150 750 mg/day 750 mg/day schizophrenia - adolescents ( 13 17 years ) ( 2.2 ) 25 mg twice daily 400 800 mg/day 800 mg/day bipolar mania - adults monotherapy adjunct lithium divalproex ( 2.2 ) 50 mg twice daily 400 800 mg/day 800 mg/day bipolar mania - children adolescents ( 10 17 years ) , monotherapy ( 2.2 ) 25 mg twice daily 400 600 mg/day 600 mg/day bipolar depression - adults ( 2.2 ) 50 mg daily bedtime 300 mg/day 300 mg/day geriatric : consider lower starting dose ( 50 mg/day ) , slower titration careful monitoring initial dosing period elderly ( 2.3 , 8.5 ) hepatic impairment : lower starting dose ( 25 mg/day ) slower titration may needed ( 2.4 , 8.7 , 12.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions: quetiapine tablets , usp 25 mg peach , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets debossed ‘ e 52 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-489-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-489-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-489-10 quetiapine tablets , usp 50 mg white , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ f 84 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-490-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-490-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-490-10 quetiapine tablets , usp 100 mg yellow , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ e 53 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-491-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-491-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-491-10 quetiapine tablets , usp 150 mg light yellow , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ e 54 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-492-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-492-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-492-10 quetiapine ablets , usp 200 mg white , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ e 55 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-493-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-493-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-493-10 quetiapine tablets , usp 300 mg white , capsule shaped , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ e 56 ’ one side plain side . bottles 60 ndc 65862-494-60 bottles 100 ndc 65862-494-01 bottles 1,000 ndc 65862-494-99 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-494-10 quetiapine tablets , usp 400 mg yellow , capsule shaped , biconvex , film-coated tablets imprinted ‘ f 85 ’ one side plain side . bottles 100 ndc 65862-495-01 bottles 500 ndc 65862-495-05 10 x 10 unit-dose tablets ndc 65862-495-10 store 20º 25ºc ( 68º 77ºf ) ; excursions permitted 15º 30ºc ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: hypersensitivity quetiapine excipients quetiapine tablets formulation . anaphylactic reported patients treated quetiapine tablets .
indications_original: Quetiapine tablets are an atypical antipsychotic indicated for the treatment of: Schizophrenia (1.1) Bipolar I disorder manic episodes (1.2) Bipolar disorder, depressive episodes (1.2)
contraindications_original: Quetiapine tablets can be taken with or without food ( 2.1 ) Indication Initial Dose Recommended Dose Maximum Dose Schizophrenia - Adults (2.2) 25 mg twice daily 150 to 750 mg/day 750 mg/day Schizophrenia - Adolescents (13 to 17 years) (2.2) 25 mg twice daily 400 to 800 mg/day 800 mg/day Bipolar Mania - Adults Monotherapy or as an adjunct to lithium or divalproex (2.2) 50 mg twice daily 400 to 800 mg/day 800 mg/day Bipolar Mania - Children and Adolescents (10 to 17 years), Monotherapy (2.2) 25 mg twice daily 400 to 600 mg/day 600 mg/day Bipolar Depression - Adults (2.2) 50 mg once daily at bedtime 300 mg/day 300 mg/day Geriatric Use: Consider a lower starting dose (50 mg/day), slower titration and careful monitoring during the initial dosing period in the elderly (2.3 , 8.5) Hepatic Impairment: Lower starting dose (25 mg/day) and slower titration may be needed (2.4, 8.7 , 12.3)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 25 mg are peach, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets debossed with ‘E 52’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-489-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-489-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-489-10
                     
                         Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 50 mg are white, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘F 84’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-490-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-490-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-490-10
                     
                         Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 100 mg are yellow, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘E 53’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-491-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-491-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-491-10
                     
                         Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 150 mg are light yellow, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘E 54’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-492-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-492-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets            NDC 65862-492-10
                          Quetiapine T
                     ablets, USP 200 mg are white, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘E 55’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-493-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-493-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-493-10
                     
                         Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 300 mg are white, capsule shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘E 56’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 60                                   NDC 65862-494-60             Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-494-01             Bottles of 1,000                               NDC 65862-494-99             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-494-10
                     
                         Quetiapine 
                     Tablets, USP 400 mg are yellow, capsule shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablets imprinted with ‘F 85’ on one side and plain on the other side.
                                  Bottles of 100                                 NDC 65862-495-01             Bottles of 500                                 NDC 65862-495-05             10 x 10 Unit-dose Tablets              NDC 65862-495-10
                     
                         Store at 20º to 25ºC (68º to 77ºF); excursions permitted to 15º to 30ºC (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: Hypersensitivity to quetiapine or to any excipients in the quetiapine tablets formulation. Anaphylactic reactions have been reported in patients treated with quetiapine tablets.
